title: Riot pls help me
body:
I've got a problem with league, the launcher is fine but when I click play all I get is a pitch black background where the featured champion and login should be.

how do I fix this?

replies.body:
That is several components failing to load in. Might be related to your configuration of Internet Explorer, that is if you're on a Windows machine.

If that is so, open up Internet Explorer, go into its settings, and reset to default. Try opening League again. If you still get the black screen or other errors, try setting the security level of Internet Explorer to "Medium-Low", or whatever the lowest possible is.

Best of luck.
